mapper.insert: INSERT INTO popup_comment_tbl (user_id, popup_id, content, rating, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{popup_id}, #{content}, #{rating}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT popup_comment_id, user_id, popup_id, content, created_at, updated_at FROM popup_comment_tbl WHERE popup_id = #{popup_id} ORDER BY created_at DESC
